CustomField.formula: IF ( ISBLANK(pse__Estimated_Time_To_Completion__c), IF (pse__Estimated_Hours__c - pse__Actual_Hours__c < 0, 0, /* Never allow this field to go below 0 */ pse__Estimated_Hours__c - pse__Actual_Hours__c ), pse__Estimated_Time_To_Completion__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of hours remaining to complete the task derived from Estimated Time to Completion (Task) when set. Calculated otherwise from estimated hours minus actual hours.
CustomField.label: Hours Remaining
